data_table.description: Sample ID, sample ID of parents, parent sample ID title, sample comment, collection status of samples, sample class, sample type, quality of sample, concentration of sample, pathological status of tissue where sample was obtained, percent of tissue necrosis, tissue review comments, histopathology quality, RNA integrity number, spectral absorbance, sample name [normal, tumor, DNA, RNA, sRNA] of participants with colon, beast or ovarian cancer and involved in the "Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium (CPTAC) Proteogenomic Confirmatory Study of Breast, Colon, Lung, and Ovarian Tumors" project.

variable.name: Specimen_Label
variable.description: Unique specimen label. Barcode. The extension (_Dn) indicates a derivative of a parent sample. For example abdc1234_D4 is derived from abdc1234.

variable.name: Specimen_Parent_Label
variable.description: Unique specimen label. Barcode for the parent sample in Specimen_Label

variable.name: Specimen_Parent_Title
variable.description: Description of specimen source, related to tissue sample in clinical variables. [Cells1; Cells2; Cells3; Tumor Tissue1; Tumor Tissue2; Tumor Tissue3; Tumor Tissue4; Tumor Tissue5]

variable.name: Specimen_Comments
variable.description: Comments on specimen

variable.name: Specimen_Pooled
variable.description: Were multiple samples pooled to create this sample? [TRUE; FALSE]

variable.name: Collection_Status
variable.description: Collection Status, were samples collected? [Collected; Not-collected]

variable.name: Specimen_Class
variable.description: High level grouping of specimens. [Molecular; Tissue; Blood]

variable.name: Specimen_Type
variable.description: Specific specimen type. [Frozen Tissue; RNA; DNA]

variable.name: Initial_Quantity
variable.description: Quantity of the specimen when the specimen was first received.
variable.unit: mg (tissue); ul or ml (fluids); ug (nucleic acids); count (tissu

variable.name: Concentration
variable.description: Concentration of the molecular specimen.

variable.name: Pathological_Status
variable.description: Pathological status of tissue such as malignant or other status. [Malignant; Non-Malignant]

variable.name: Tissue_Necrosis
variable.description: Percent necrosis.

variable.name: Tumor_Cellularity
variable.description: Percent tumor cellularity

variable.name: Total_Cellularity
variable.description: Percentage of cross sectional area of a solid tissue section observed to be occupied by nucleated cells.

variable.name: Tissue_Review_Comments
variable.description: Tissue review comments. [Normal mucosal region has resident lymphocytes; IDC-M; Small tissue core; Well differentiated; Adenocarcinoma-MD; Adenocarcinoma high grade; Adenocarcinoma]

variable.name: Histopathology_Quality
variable.description: Histopathology quality. [Fair- Definable Tissue Architecture; Good- Definable Cellular Detail; Excellent- Definable Nuclear Detail]

variable.name: RIN_Value
variable.description: RNA integrity number (RIN) from an algorithm for assigning integrity values to RNA measurements.

variable.name: Absorbance_260
variable.description: Spectral absorbance at 260A for 260/280 ratio for DNA or RNA quality.

variable.name: Absorbance_280
variable.description: Spectral absorbance at 280A for 260/280 ratio for DNA or RNA quality.

variable.name: Short_Specimen_Label
variable.description: Short name for specimen used by sequencing contractor in file names. There is some inconsistency in the use of a dash "-" or an underscore "_" in naming. A 1-DN sample ID may have a file name 1_DN. DN=normal tissue DNA; DM=tumor tissue, DNA; R= mRNA; SR=small RNA.

variable.name: HistologicalDiagnosis
variable.description: Histological diagnosis of primary tumor or cells (*).
variable.comment: (*) : indicates if the sample is associated with normal blood obtained from the cancer subject.
